pkgmetadata.longdescription: |makesite| Makesite=================== Makesite is the system for deploying and managing sites.This have support for **nginx**, **supervisor**, **uwsgi**, **git**, **django**, **tornado**, **compass**, **memcached**, **cron**, **virtualenv**, **pip**, **zetalibrary**, **celeryd** and more.Please read the docs_ for more info... image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/klen/makesite.png?branch=develop :target: http://travis-ci.org/klen/makesite :alt: Build Status.. |makesite| image:: https://raw.github.com/klen/makesite/master/icon.png.. _docs: http://packages.python.org/makesite/
